items.content_html: If you wanna get in touch with other software developers and see what new approaches evolve, I can recommend the WeAreDevelopers World Congress, happening in two months 17th-19th of July in Berlin, Germany. See you there. #webdevelopment #SaaS www.wearedevelopers.com/world-con…

items.content_html: Well, Twitter/X crossposting with IFTTT based on help.micro.blog/t/cross-p… not working yet. Try #2
items.content_text: Well, Twitter/X crossposting with IFTTT based on [help.micro.blog/t/cross-p...](https://help.micro.blog/t/cross-posting-with-the-ifttt-service/86) not working yet. Try #2

items.content_html: If everything went right this message was automatically posted to Bluesky, Mastodon, Twitter/X and LinkedIn. Thx to micro.blog and a little IFTTT magic. As this service fragmentation is not going away we have to deal with it somehow.

items.content_html: Finally, hello world from my own account :-) Thx @help for resolving the issue so fast. Looking forward to my new home for distributing to my social media channels.
